SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltPrcsPrfmncMapper.selectFcltPrcsPrfmncRawDataList */ OTI.CRTR_YR , OTI.APC_CD ,(SELECT APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD) AS APC_NM , OTI.SN , OTI.ITEM_CD , OTI.ITEM_NM
, AOPD.APC_TRMT_AMT , AOPD.APC_TRMT_VLM , AOPD.TM_SPMT_AMT , AOPD.TM_SPMT_RT , AOPD.APC_GNRL_TRMT_AMT , AOPD.APC_OGNZ_CPRTN_SORT_TRST , AOPD.APC_CTRT_EMSPAP FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_TRMT_ITEM OTI , TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRFMNC_DTL AOPD WHERE 1=1 AND OTI.APC_CD = AOPD.APC_CD(+) AND OTI.CRTR_YR = AOPD.CRTR_YR(+) AND OTI.SN = AOPD.SN(+) AND OTI.OGNZ_SE_CD = '2' AND OTI.APC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND OTI.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND OTI.APC_CD IN (SELECT APC_CD FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CTPV = (SELECT CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
AND SGG = (SELECT SGG FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY OTI.CRTR_YR , APC_NM , OTI.SN
